rooms.description: Integrates a contemporary kitchen design with living space featuring high ceilings and ample natural light.
Luxurious master bedroom located in the north-east for positive Vastu energy.
Cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy and ventilation.
Spacious children's room situated in the south-west region for balanced energy.

openings.description: Multiple large windows along the east and south walls for maximum natural light and adherence to Vastu.
